title: (x) ISO 50 - Marina - ITC Bauhaus {Andreas}
content:
This is off of Scott Hansen's site featuring his work, iso50.com

What font is this? looks similar to Locator, but the "S" says otherwise. Please help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ISO50\_MARINA.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021035528/http:/typophile.com/files/ISO50_MARINA.jpg) | 131.71 KB |
author: Tyler Lang

comments.content:
ITC Bauhaus  
 [www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/itc-bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021035528/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/itc-bauhaus "www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/itc-bauhaus")  
This ISO50 site must be really popular.  
credits go to georg form [www.typografie.info/typoforum/viewtopic.php?t=1576](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021035528/http:/www.typografie.info/typoforum/viewtopic.php?t=1576 "www.typografie.info/typoforum/viewtopic.php?t=1576")

-- [astype.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021035528/http:/www.astype.de/)--

actually i think it's from the sf muni logo. which may be a font too...  
you can see it (sort of) here:

[http://www.trampicturebook.de/tram/california/sf/muni/1999-07-19-18-X800...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021035528/http:/www.trampicturebook.de/tram/california/sf/muni/1999-07-19-18-X800.jpg "http://www.trampicturebook.de/tram/california/sf/muni/1999-07-19-18-X800.jpg")

oh wait, you mean the other type...
